text: @DineshDSouza @realDonaldTrump And of course you give us #fakenews! The video cuts, but there is a follow up question about just that “inflating the numbers” Fauci answers “If someone goes to the hospital with Covid19 has a heart attack, it will be listed as a heart attack”. Stop spreading lies...
